extensionDescription.original: Select text on any web page, and have the computer read it out loud for you by simply clicking the Talkie button.

frontend_aboutThankYou.message: Tack f칬r att du anv칛nder Talkie - om du gillar det, ber칛tta f칬r dina v칛nner!

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopup.original: Hide donation buttons in the popup

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Det 칛r inte som att jag inte vill att du ska donera f칬r att st칬dja Talkie och 칬ppen k칛llkod i allm칛mhet - jag vill bara inte att du ska bli irriterad n칛r du anv칛nder Talkie till att b칬rja med. Om du inakiverar donationsknapparna i bubblan, hoppas jag att du 칛ven st칬djer Talkie p친 n친got s칛tt! Knapparna kommer alltid vara tillg칛ngliga h칛r bland alternativen, utifall att.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie 游 Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general - I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Alla bidrag till Talkie g칬rs med tillst친nd av Contributor License Agreement (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie utvecklades ett par dagar f칬re ny친r 2016-2017, p친 utmaning av en kompis. Utmaningen b칬rjade med fr친gan: under pendlingen till jobbet, 칛r det m칬jligt att lyssna p친 en artikel ist칛llet f칬r att l칛sa den? L칛tt som en pl칛tt, sa jag, och satte ig친ng med att bevisa det - eller i alla fall att f친 min webbl칛sare att l칛sa upp text med en knasig r칬st. Den grundl칛ggande versionen, utan n친got anv칛ndargr칛nssnitt, visade sig vara trivial att skapa. Att l칛gga till ett anv칛ndargr칛nssnitt tog l칛ngre tid. Att l칛gga till ordentlig spr친kdetektering kr칛vde en dr칬s mer kod. Att bem칛stra buggar i webbl칛saren 칛nnu mer jobb. Listan p친 f칬rb칛ttringar och nyttigheter v칛xer - och ett par tusen rader kod senare, ser du resultatet.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it - or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on - and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie - if you like it, tell your friends!
